title: Civil liberties scores- Nigeria and China

content.description: Source: Freedom House, 20207 -- least civil liberties, 0 -- most civil liberties
content.question:
<!--td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;}-->

Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the graph, describe the trend in civil liberties in Nigeria between 1995 and 2015. Explain a possible reason for this trend.

(b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about sources of authority in Nigeria.

(c) Explain why the score for civil liberties in Nigeria differs from the score for civil liberties in China.
